permission.name: !eg_permission
permission.description: Check if you have permission to use moderator functions.

say.name: !eg_say <argument>
say.description: Have the bot echo what is specified. (Mod Function)

stats.name: !eg_stats
stats.description: Check how many servers Egg-Bot is running on.

info.name: !eg_info
info.description: Print a list of information about Egg-Bot, including ways to contribute to Egg-Bot's development.

roll.name: !eg_roll <2d10>
roll.description: Rolls a certain amount of dice a form commonly used in D&D! For example, rolling two 10 sided dice would be '2d10'.

invite.name: !eg_invite
invite.description: Generate an invite link for the current bot.

wikihow.name: !eg_wikihow
wikihow.description: Returns a random image from Wikihow via the web game 'damn.dog'.

askme.name: !eg_askme
askme.description: Asks a question sourced from questions others have asked me (Beware of any offensive content!)

mute.name: !eg_mute <@user>
mute.description: Stops a user from sending messages to the channel, use !eg_unmute to reverse this. (Mod Function)

unmute.name: !eg_unmute <@user>
unmute.description: Allows a user to send messages to the current channel. (Mod Function)

kick.name: !eg_kick <@user> <reason>
kick.description: Kick a member from the server if you're a moderator. (Only kicks members below the bot in rank)

ban.name: !eg_ban <@user> <reason> <days worth of messages to delete>
ban.description: Ban a member from the server if you're a moderator. (Only bans members below the bot in rank)

prune.name: !eg_prune <number>
prune.description: Delete the specified amount of messages. Must be 100 or less. (Mod Function)

getlog.name: !eg_getlog
getlog.description: Get EggBot's logs for the guild via DM. (Mod Function)

addsong.name: !eg_addsong <search term or link>
addsong.description: Adds the requested item to the song queue and plays it if the queue is already empty.

random.name: !eg_random <search term>
random.description: Kind of like the !eg_addsong command but picks a random result when searching for the item instead of the top result.

forcestop.name: !eg_clear
forcestop.description: Stops the currently playing broadcast and clears the queue. (Mod Function)

forceskip.name: !eg_forceskip
forceskip.description: Skips the current song in the queue and plays the next one. (Mod Function)

voteskip.name: !eg_voteskip
voteskip.description: Vote to skip the current song. 60% of the vote needed to win and skip the song.

forceplay.name: !eg_forceplay
forceplay.description: Force bot to play from the top of the queue. (For debug reasons) (Mod Function)

que.name: !eg_queue
que.description: Command to list all songs in the current song queue.
